# CLRegionState.unknown

**Case**

It is unknown whether the location is inside or outside of the region.

## Declaration

```swift
case unknown
```

## Region States

- **CLRegionState.inside**: The location is inside of the given region.
- **CLRegionState.outside**: The location is outside of the given region.

items.description: The location is inside of the given region.

items.description: The location is outside of the given region.
